wikipedia_page.main: Margaret Mann Phillips FRSL (1906–1987) was a British academic who specialized in Renaissance literature and history.  She is most noted for her work on Erasmus.

response: On 3 July 1940, Phillips married Margaret Mann Phillips, an Erasmus scholar. Together, they had a son and a daughter.
